column2: "Na Aradhen
column3: Keenannyi no a
column4: ɔtse Pomu afamu no
column5: tsee dɛ wɔreka dɛ Israel nam Atarim ɔkwan do aba no; nna ɔnye Israel bɔkoe
column6: na ɔfaa hɔn mu binom ndɔmmum."

column2: "Na Israelfo bɔɔ EWURADZE anohoba see dɛ
column3: Sɛ ɔwo dze ɔman yi rehyɛ hɛn nsa dze a
column4: nkyɛ yɛbɛsɛɛ hɔn nkurow huntuhuntu."

column2: "Na EWURADZE tsiee Israelfo ndze
column3: na oyii Keenanfo no mae; na wɔsɛɛ hɔn nye hɔn nkurow no huntuhuntu: na wɔtoo bea no dzin Horma."

column2: "Na wotui fi bepɔw Hor ho dze faa Mbɛw Po  kwan do
column3: dɛ wɔrobɔ Edom asaase ho aprɔw akɔ: na ahomtsew kaa ɔman no hɔn kra pii wɔ ɔkwan no ntsi."
column4: "#21.4 MBƐW PO: Hwɛ Eks 14.2."

column2: "Na ɔman no kasaa tsiaa Nyankopɔn
column3: nye Moses
column4: dɛ
column5: Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na hom eyi hɛn efi Egypt dɛ yembowuwu wɔ sar do yi? Na edziban bi nnyi hɔ; na nsu bi nnyi hɔ; na edzibanhun yi afon hɛn kra."

column2: "Na EWURADZE somaa mbowatsena a wɔsɔw wɔ ɔman no mu
column3: na wɔkɔsosɔɔw ɔman no; na Israel mu nkorɔfo pii wuwui."

column2: "Na ɔman no baa Moses nkyɛn bɛsee dɛ
column3: Yɛayɛ bɔn
column4: osiandɛ yɛakasa etsia EWURADZE
column6: ma ombeyi mbowatsena no mfi hɛn do. Na Moses paa kyɛw maa ɔman no."

column2: "Na EWURADZE see Moses dɛ
column3: Yɛ boran abowatsena
column4: na fa si dua do: na ɔbɛba dɛ
column5: obiara a abowatsena asɔw no no

column2: "Na Moses yɛɛ boran abowatsena
column3: na ɔdze sii dua no do: na ɔbaa dɛ
column4: sɛ abowatsena ka nyimpa bi a

column2: "Na Israelmba no tui
column3: na wɔkɛkyeer nsera wɔ Obot."

column2: "Na wotui fii Obot
column3: na wɔkɛkyeer nsera wɔ Iye-abarim
column4: wɔ sar a ɔwɔ Moab enyim

column2: "Hɔ na wofi tui
column3: na wɔkɛkyeer nsera wɔ Zered bɔnsa mu."

column2: "Hɔ na wofi tui
column3: na wɔkɛkyeer nsera wɔ Arnon a ɔwɔ sar do a ofi Amorifo ntoaado ba no
column4: n’egya: na esutsen Arnon Moab ntoaado a

column2: "Dɛm ntsi wɔka no EWURADZE Akodzi nwoma no mu dɛ
column3: Vaheb wɔ Sufa
column4: Nye Arnon mbɔnsa no
column6: "Nye mbɔnsa no a ɔtserew no a Ɔkom kɔ Ar tsenabew afamu no
column7: Na ɔtwer Moab ntoaado ho no."

column2: "Na hɔ na wofi tui kɔr Beer
column3: nsubura a EWURADZE kaa ho asɛm kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ
column4: Boa ɔman no ano

column2: "Aber no mu na Israel toow ndwom yi dɛ: Nsubura tue ɛ; hom ngye no do:"
"Nsubura a ahenmba tui no
column3: Ɔman no mu ekunyin no fumfunii
column4: Wɔdze ahempoma
column5: ɔnye hɔn mpoma. Na wofi sar no do tui kɔr Mattana:"

column2: "na wofi Mattana kɔr Nahaliel: na wofi Nahaliel kɔr Bamot:"
"na wofi Bamot kɔr bɔnsa a ɔwɔ Moab haban mu wɔ Pisga etsifi a ɔhwɛ sar yiredede no enyi no mu."
"Na Israel somaa abɔfo ma wɔkɔr Amorifo hen Sihon nkyɛn
column3: dɛ
column5: "Ma muntwa mu mfa w’asaase do: yɛremman haban mu
column6: anaa wenyin ture mu; yɛronnom nsubura mu nsu bi: yɛrefa ɔhen tsempɔn do akɔ
column7: ekodu dɛ yeetwa mu wɔ wo ntoaado."

column2: "Na Sihon amma Israel kwan ma woeenntwa mu wɔ no ntoaado: na mbom ɔboaa ne man nyinara ano
column3: na ofiir edzi kehyiaa Israel wɔ sar no do
column4: na ɔbaa Jahaz: na ɔnye Israel bɔkoe."

column2: "Na Israel dze nkrantsee ano kum no
column3: na ɔfaa n’asaase ofi Arnon do dze kɔ Jabbok do
column4: mekyerɛ okodu Ammonmba ho: osiandɛ Ammonmba ntoaado no ɔyɛ dzen."

column2: "Na Israel faa nkurow yi nyinara: na Israel tsenaa Amorifo nkurow no nyinara mu
column3: wɔ Hesbon
column4: nye no ho nkuroba nyinara mu."

column2: "Na Hesbon yɛ Amorifo hen Sihon kurow
column3: ɔno na ɔnye nkan no Moabhen no ako
column4: na ɔagye ne nsamu n’asaase nyinara kodu Arnon ho."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi hɔn a wɔkasa wɔ mbɛbu mu no ka dɛ
column3: Hom mbra Hesbon
column4: Ma wɔnkyekyer na wontsintsim Sihon kurow no:"

column2: "Na ogya bi efi Hesbon
column3: Ogyaframee efi Sihon kurow mu: Ɔamen Moab Ar
column4: Arnon mbea sorɔnsorɔm do ekunyin no"

column2: "Ɔwo Moab
column3: due! Kemos ɔman
column4: ɔwo ayera: Oeyi ne mbabanyin ama dɛ eguamfo
column5: Na ne mbabaa akɔ ndɔmmum mu

column2: "Yɛatotow hɔn; Hesbon ayera araa ekodu Dibon
column3: Yɛasɛɛ hɔn araa akɔ Nofa a Ɔdze kodu Medeba."

column2: "Na Israel tsenaa Amorifo asaase do."
"Na Moses somae ma wɔkɛseraa Jazer
column3: na wɔfaa no nkuroba no
column4: na wotuu Amorifo a wɔwɔ hɔ no."

column2: "Na wɔdanee na wɔkɔ fowee kɔr Basan ɔkwan do: na Basanhen Ɔge fiir edzi kehyiaa hɔn
column3: ɔno nye ne man nyinara
column4: dɛ wɔrokɔ ko wɔ Edrei."

column2: "Na EWURADZE see Moses dɛ
column3: Mma nnsuro no: na meyi ɔno
column4: nye ne man nyinara
column5: nye n’asaase mahyɛ wo nsa; na yɛ no dɛ mbrɛ eyɛɛ Amorifo hen Sihon a ɔtsenaa Hesbon no."

column2: "Nna wokunkum ɔno
column3: nye ne mbabanyin
column4: nye ne man nyinara
column5: kodur dɛ woenngyaa obi amma no: na wɔfaa n’asaase no."
